Name: Average time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total time between Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Checklist Completed after the execution of Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection following Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Total resolution time of Plagiarism Originality Report Completed across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to Plagiarism Originality Report Completed compared with the average time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Minimum time between Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and SW-EIC Reject in variants ending with rejection
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and activity SW-EIC Reject for cases where activity SW-EIC Reject occurs

Name: Average time it takes Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to be followed by any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection) in variants that proceed to peer review
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Total time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that reach final editorial decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in multi-round revision variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average cycle time of Plagiarism Originality Report Completed when followed by a checklist reminder (e.g., SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days) versus when directly followed by SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Minimum time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants involving major or minor revisions
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time between Plagiarism Originality Report Completed and First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in accepted manuscript variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants that successfully assign reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Time from Plagiarism Originality Report Completed to SW-Reviewer Agreed in the context of complex reviewer assignment sequences involving multiple declines and reminders
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
